column4: When you do a distro upgrade, are your settings and extra applicactions (like skype, opera, Prism, etc)  gone? I've been with ubuntu since edgy, but I can't remember :-X
some configurations and obsoleted packages will be gone, and/or change but that's about it
custom config's will be left untouched but they may not work with the newer applications
for most applications ubuntu runs 'update' scripts that will help you merge your old configs to comply with the newer applications.  but that's a select case
